channel.title: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development
channel.description:
[FONT=Verdana]Hello all,[/FONT]
[B]Before i start i would like to say if you don't like this project or if you are going to post pointless bullshit and nothing constructive then please don't bother posting![/B]
[FONT=Verdana]Over the past couple of weeks i have moved my previous website to a new server and also re-designed the main website, over the next week i will be implementing the new design within the rest of the website. The idea of this website is to maximize traffic to RuneScape Private Servers.[/FONT]
[CENTER][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=4][B]Media[/B][/SIZE]
Header Of Website [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/21414xf.png[/img]
Footer Of Website [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vy9l06.jpg[/img]
New Status Page Design [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mynngh.png[/img]
Play Pages [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/rcoa69.png[/img]
Bidding page [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/3480ubc.jpg[/img]
Login Box [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2r4op7a.png[/img]
My Account [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2qa33wy.png[/img]
[/FONT][/CENTER]
[FONT=Verdana][code][/FONT] [COLOR=#00FF00][FONT=Verdana]Finished[/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#FFA500][FONT=Verdana]Started[/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Verdana]Not Started[/FONT][/COLOR] [FONT=Verdana][/code][/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana][spoiler=Links][/FONT] [URL=http://"http://rstoplist.net/"]Main Site[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rstoplist.net/status"]Server Status Page[/URL] [URL=http://"http://tinychat.com/elux"]TinyChat[/URL] [FONT=Verdana][/spoiler][/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana][spoiler=Features][/FONT] [B][SIZE=3]Features [/SIZE][/B][B][COLOR=#00ff00]Status Page
[/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Add Server[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Edit Server[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Ban Server[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Delete Server[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Vote Up[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Vote Down[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Uptime[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Play Now Buttons[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Gold Servers[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Bidding System[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Bidding API[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Most Popular Servers[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Date Registered[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Verification Checks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Owner With Link To Profile[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]- Count Votes[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]- AJAX Voting[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]- Callbacks For Voting[/COLOR][/ul]
[COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Verdana][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#00FF00][FONT=Verdana][B]Web Client Maker[/B][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Verdana][/FONT][/COLOR]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]- Custom Jars[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]- Create Webclient[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]- Edit Webclient[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]- Implement With Status Page (Optional)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]- Request A JAR (This option will be maintained by staff to stop any viruses being uploaded)[/COLOR][/ul]
[B][COLOR=#00ff00] Main Website [/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#ff8c00]- Status Checker[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]- Item Database[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]- NPC Database[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]- Object Database[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]- Search Databases[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00ff00]- Chatbox (XAT For Now Until I Decide To Replace With IRC)[/COLOR][/ul]
[FONT=Verdana][/spoiler][/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]I plan to update this above list as regular as possible and this isn't some small project as the website has only been running for just under a month now and normally has around atleast 15 people active at most times. So far we have peaked 45 active users within the chatbox alone.[/FONT]
[B]I will be updating this thread later on today with media! If my links aren't allowed don't ban me please just remove them.[/B]
[FONT=Verdana]Kind Regards,[/FONT] [FONT=Verdana]Smoke[/FONT]

item.title: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Today i have updated the main post of the thread.

There is so many updates to go through which most of them I have actually forgot now!

Updates;

  • Client Maker is now usable and has been tested
  • Play pages have been added with button back to status page
  • Play field has been added to the status table if client is specified
  • Alotttt of CSS Fixes
  • Updated footer (social networking has been added also)

Upcoming;

  • AJAX Voting
  • Callback Voting
  • Gold Bidding to be launched
  • Server info button to be added to play page

Read full topic
item.source: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development

[/quote]

Yeah that bit has changed a bit still needs a bit more css to style it up.[/quote]Yes - it does.

item.title: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:17, topic:521872”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=640382.msg4315322#msg4315322 date=1371403086]
I’d much rather you provided code than pictures, a lot easier to tell you how to improve that way.
[/quote]
It’s a progress thread not “rate my code”, it’s not like people ask to see code for a server?

OT: look’s good but I don’t like your background image imo it’s unattractive and a little dull colour wise[/quote]

Thank you. Someone actually understands what this thread is about and actually posts constructively.

Read full topic

item.title: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:17, topic:521872”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=640382.msg4315322#msg4315322 date=1371403086]
I’d much rather you provided code than pictures, a lot easier to tell you how to improve that way.
[/quote]
It’s a progress thread not “rate my code”, it’s not like people ask to see code for a server?

OT: look’s good but I don’t like your background image imo it’s unattractive and a little dull colour wise[/quote]
If I was a java developer I would ask to see it, simple as that. That’s how I critique and ultimately help people improve and it’s how a lot of website developers do it too, you can’t compare this board to any other on the site just because it’s a development thread.

Read full topic

item.title: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Considering when you said about developers joining your project you said they must have a knowledge of PHP so I assume the backend code is written in PHP so you’ll understand that I can’t critique the site even when it’s online. Regardless of any of that, why did you choose PHP when there are much better alternatives?

Read full topic
item.source: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development

item.title: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:12, topic:521872”][quote author=Elux link=topic=640382.msg4315323#msg4315323 date=1371403195]

Removed the advertisement links. Also, I’d much rather you provided code than pictures, a lot easier to tell you how to improve that way.

Considering I run a web development company with over 7 years experience I’m hardly likely to release my source code.
[/quote]
And that means anything to me? lol. The moparscape server status page does fine and that’s open source. There are toplists released left right and centre so why would it make a difference if you posted some excepts of code? It wouldn’t. The only reason anyone would like to keep a source like this closed is because they’re either not telling the truth in the development log or the code inside it isn’t of a high quality. Especially when I never actually asked for the source to be released, excerpts from the source would be fine. I’m not a designer so I don’t judge on a design basis, I judge on a programming basis.[/quote]

Well you can take a full look around the website when it’s finished, then you can judge.

Read full topic
item.source: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development

item.title: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Elux, post:6, topic:521872”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=640382.msg4315322#msg4315322 date=1371403086]
Removed the advertisement links. Also, I’d much rather you provided code than pictures, a lot easier to tell you how to improve that way.
[/quote]

Considering I run a web development company with over 7 years experience I’m hardly likely to release my source code.[/quote]
And that means anything to me? lol. The moparscape server status page does fine and that’s open source. There are toplists released left right and centre so why would it make a difference if you posted some excepts of code? It wouldn’t. The only reason anyone would like to keep a source like this closed is because they’re either not telling the truth in the development log or the code inside it isn’t of a high quality. Especially when I never actually asked for the source to be released, excerpts from the source would be fine. I’m not a designer so I don’t judge on a design basis, I judge on a programming basis.

Read full topic

item.title: RSTOPLIST - Server Status Page V2 - Development
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

[FONT=Verdana]Hello all,[/FONT]

Before i start i would like to say if you don’t like this project or if you are going to post pointless bullshit and nothing constructive then please don’t bother posting!

[FONT=Verdana]Over the past couple of weeks i have moved my previous website to a new server and also re-designed the main website, over the next week i will be implementing the new design within the rest of the website. The idea of this website is to maximize traffic to RuneScape Private Servers.[/FONT]

[CENTER][FONT=Verdana][SIZE=4]Media[/SIZE]

Header Of Website

21414xf.png1036×408

Footer Of Website

vy9l06.jpg1351×389

New Status Page Design

2mynngh.png945×673

Play Pages

rcoa69.png1036×670

Bidding page

3480ubc.jpg970×676

Login Box

My Account

[/FONT][/CENTER]

[FONT=Verdana][/FONT] [COLOR=#00FF00][FONT=Verdana]Finished[/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#FFA500][FONT=Verdana]Started[/FONT][/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Verdana]Not Started[/FONT][/COLOR] [FONT=Verdana][/FONT]

[FONT=Verdana][spoiler=Links][/FONT]
Main Site
Server Status Page
TinyChat
[FONT=Verdana][/spoiler][/FONT]

[FONT=Verdana][spoiler=Features][/FONT]
[SIZE=3]Features
[/SIZE][B][COLOR=#00ff00]Status Page

[/COLOR][/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00ff00]- Add Server[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Edit Server[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Ban Server[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Delete Server[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Vote Up[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Vote Down[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Uptime[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Play Now Buttons[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Gold Servers[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Bidding System[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Bidding API[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Most Popular Servers[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Date Registered[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Verification Checks[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Owner With Link To Profile[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]- Count Votes[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#FF0000]- AJAX Voting[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ff0000]- Callbacks For Voting[/COLOR][/ul]

[COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Verdana][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#00FF00][FONT=Verdana]Web Client Maker[/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Verdana][/FONT][/COLOR]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]- Custom Jars[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]- Create Webclient[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]- Edit Webclient[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]- Implement With Status Page (Optional)[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#00FF00]- Request A JAR (This option will be maintained by staff to stop any viruses being uploaded)[/COLOR][/ul]

[COLOR=#00ff00]
Main Website
[/COLOR]

[ul][][COLOR=#ff8c00]- Status Checker[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ff0000]- Item Database[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ff0000]- NPC Database[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ff0000]- Object Database[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#ff0000]- Search Databases[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00ff00]- Chatbox (XAT For Now Until I Decide To Replace With IRC)[/COLOR][/ul]

[FONT=Verdana][/spoiler][/FONT]

[FONT=Verdana]I plan to update this above list as regular as possible and this isn’t some small project as the website has only been running for just under a month now and normally has around atleast 15 people active at most times. So far we have peaked 45 active users within the chatbox alone.[/FONT]

I will be updating this thread later on today with media! If my links aren’t allowed don’t ban me please just remove them.

[FONT=Verdana]Kind Regards,[/FONT]
[FONT=Verdana]Smoke[/FONT]

Read full topic
